component.name: maxtryx
component.summary: A terminal Matrix client for Vim addicts

screenshot.caption: Example screenshot of room and lists of rooms, spaces and members within maxtryx

description.p: `maxtryx` is a client for the Matrix communication protocol. It provides a terminal user interface with familiar Vim keybindings, and includes support for multiple profiles, threads, spaces, notifications, reactions, custom keybindings, and more.
